ARABIC: وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّرِيَكَ مَا نَعِدُهُمْ لَقَٰدِرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We are certainly capable of letting you see what We have promised them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have certainly the power to make you see what We have promised them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely We are able to show you what We warn them against.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have the Power to strike them with torment before your very eyes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed We are Able to show you the promise they are given.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed We are able to show you that with which We have threatened them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely We are well able to make you see what We threaten them with.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Assuredly, We are able to show thee that We promise them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And verily We are Able to show thee that which We have promised them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We certainly have the power to show you what they have been warned about.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily to shew them that wherewith We threaten them We are surely Able.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We are indeed able to show you what We promise them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We are certainly able to show thee (in fulfilment) that against which they are warned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed We are Able to show you (O Muhammad SAW) that with which We have threatened them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, We are able to show you that which We promised them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We are surely Able to show you what We promise them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, We are able to show you what We have promised them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:95] And truly We are able to show you what We promise them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And verily We are Able to show thee) Muhammad (that which We have promised them) of torment on the Day of Badr.
